definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: At last, several suggestions for the research and development of polarizer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 對偏光片的研究與產業發展提出了幾點建議。

sentences.english: A polarising filter can eliminate reflections or enhance saturation.
sentences.chinese: 偏光鏡能夠消除反光，增加色澤飽和度。

sentences.english: Linear polarizers are used in a wide variety of applications.
sentences.chinese: 線性偏光器用於多種應用。

sentences.english: With slight modification this kind of polarizing microscope can be used as gem microscope.
sentences.chinese: 只要稍加改動這種偏光顯微鏡便可以用做寶石顯微鏡。

sentences.english: It is no use employing a polariscope to identify an opaque gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 利用偏光鏡鑑別一個不透明的寶石是沒有用的。

sentences.english: The transformation of the spherulites of nylon 1010 has been studied by means of PLM.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用偏光顯微鏡研究了尼龍1010球晶的轉化。

sentences.english: Polarisers in black and white and color photography can be used.
sentences.chinese: 偏光鏡在黑白和彩色攝影中都能被使用。

sentences.english: In the application of polarized light beam-splitting prism, people constantly pose demands on light intensity beam-splitting ratio.
sentences.chinese: 在偏光分束棱鏡應用中，常對其光強分束比提出要求。

sentences.english: The conclusion offers a gist for designing and making polarizer , and establishes a base for research of polarized light technique.
sentences.chinese: 所得結論爲偏光器件的設計與製作提供了依據。

sentences.english: The Study of Iodine Contained Polarizer's Stretching and Dyeing Process via the Design of …
sentences.chinese: 實驗計畫法在碘系偏光膜延伸染色製程條件之研究。

sentences.english: Polarizers can also increase the contrast of a photograph because they can remove reflection.
sentences.chinese: 偏光片還可以增加照片對比，因爲他們可以消除反射。

sentences.english: While watching digital stereo movies, viewers are required to wear polarized stereo glasses.
sentences.chinese: 觀看數字立體電影時，觀衆要佩戴偏光立體眼鏡。

sentences.english: Circular polarizers are used to improve the viewability of emissive displays.
sentences.chinese: 圓形偏光鏡用於改善發射顯示器的可見性。

sentences.english: The finished glass product when viewed in the polariscope after annealing.
sentences.chinese: 成品的玻璃纖維產品的時候，看在偏光鏡後退火。

sentences.english: Outstanding Blur-free picture quality with advance 3D polarized process.
sentences.chinese: 先進的3D偏光技術，塑造無閃爍的完美畫面。

definition: to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
